org.cougaar.core.mobility.ldm
Interface MobilityFactory

All Superinterfaces:
Factory
public interface MobilityFactory
extends Factory

A Factory for creating AgentControl objects.

Method Summary
 AgentControl createAgentControl(UID ownerUID, MessageAddress target, AbstractTicket abstractTicket)
          Create a request that an agent be added/removed/moved, which is sent directly to the specified target.

Method Detail

createTicketIdentifier

java.lang.Object createTicketIdentifier()
Get a new ticket identifier for use when creating a Ticket.

createAgentControl

AgentControl createAgentControl(UID ownerUID,
                                MessageAddress target,
                                AbstractTicket abstractTicket)
Create a request that an agent be added/removed/moved, which is sent directly to the specified target.

Add requests must specify the node address as the target.

Remove requests must specify either the agent or its node as the target.

Move requests must specify either null, the agent, or the node running the agent that is to be moved. If the agent is specified, the request first passes through the agent (RedirectMovePlugin).

createMoveAgent

MoveAgent createMoveAgent(Ticket ticket)
Create an agent move request -- this has been replaced by the "AgentControl" APIs, but is still supported.

Parameters:
ticket - must have a ticket identifier that was created by the "createTicketIdentifier()" method.
See Also:
new API
